ctx: intros h h' cid t lli llt st st' m H H0.
pose proof handleRequestVote_cases h h' t lli llt (snd st) st' m H as HC.
exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 2 branches.

original: intros h h' cid t lli llt st st' m H H0. pose proof handleRequestVote_cases h h' t lli llt (snd st) st' m H as HC. destruct HC as [| [-> | [-> [V| [LT [V T]]]]]]. - rewrite H0 in H. inversion H. - left. split; auto. rewrite H0 in V. inversion V. auto. - destruct (nat_eq_dec t (currentTerm (snd st))); subst. + rewrite H0 in V. inversion V. + right. split; auto. split; auto. split. * apply votesWithLog_update_elections_data_request_vote with h st t; eauto. * apply moreUpToDate_dec. apply handleRequestVote_currentTerm in H. simpl in H. apply maxTerm_le_maxTerm with st' st. -- rewrite !maxTerm_unroll. auto. -- now rewrite moreUpToDate_correct.
